text: Below is a list of international presidential trips made by Mário Soares as President of the Portuguese Republic. ==First term (1986-1991)== ===1986=== {| class="wikitable" !Country !Locations !Date !Details |- | |São Tomé, Príncipe |5-8 December | |- | |Praia, Tarrafal |8-11 December | |} ===1987=== {| class="wikitable" !Country !Locations !Date !Details |- | |São Paulo |28 March-April 5 |Received a honoris causa by the São Paulo State University (UNESP). |- | |Moscow, Yerevan, Baku |22-29 November |Meeting with the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union, Mikhail Gorbachev and with activist Andrei Sakharov. |- | |Madrid, Salamanca, Barcelona, Seville |14-19 December | |} ===1988=== {| class="wikitable" !Country !Locations !Date !Details |- | | |18-23 April | |- | | |16-18 May | |- | | |18-21 May | |- | | |12-17 December | |} ===1989=== {| class="wikitable" !Country !Locations !Date !Details |- | and 25px Macau | |27 February-5 March | |- | | |5-12 April | |- | | |27 September-2 October | |- | | |2-4 October | |- | |Paris, Lyon, Bordeaux |16-21 October |Meeting with the President of the French Republic, François Mitterrand. |- | | |20-24 November | |- | | |24-26 November | |- | | |26-30 November | |} ===1990=== {| class="wikitable" !Country !Locations !Date !Details |- | | |19-20 February | |- | | |26-29 April | |- | | |15-20 May | |- | | |9-11 October | |} ==Second term (1991-1996)== ===1992=== {| class="wikitable" !Country !Locations !Date !Details |- | |Muscat |23-24 January |Meeting with the Sultan of Oman, Qaboos Bin Said. |- | |New Delhi, Jaipur, Kochi, Mumbai, Pangim, Pondá, Daman, Diu |24 January-2 February |Meeting with the President of India, Ramaswamy Venkataraman during the Indian Republic Day (26 January). |- | | |6-9 May | |- | | |21-27 October | |} ===1993=== {| class="wikitable" !Country !Locations !Date !Details |- | | |27 April-2 May | |- | | |1-4 June | |- | | |4-6 June | |- | | |9-14 July | |- | | |18-27 October | |- | and 25px Macau | |28-31 October | |} ===1994=== {| class="wikitable" !Country !Locations !Date !Details |- | | |13-16 September | |- | | |9-11 October | |- | | |11-16 October | |- | | |17-18 October | |- | | |18-20 October | |- | | |16-17 November | |} ===1995=== {| class="wikitable" !Country !Locations !Date !Details |- | | |7-8 March | |- |25px Macau | |6-10 April | |- | |Beijing, Xian, Shanghai |10-17 April | |- | | |17-19 April | |- | |Jerusalem |31 October-4 November |Attended the Knesset, visited the Museum of the Holocaust; attended the funeral of Yitzhak Rabin. |- | |Gaza |4-5 November |Meeting with the President of the Palestinian Authority, Yasser Arafat; he was in Gaza when the Israeli Prime Minister, Yitzhak Rabin, was murdererd. |- | | |17-24 November | |- | | |4-5 November |Meeting with President France Albert René. |} ===1996=== {| class="wikitable" !Country !Locations !Date !Details |- | | |8-11 January | |- title: List of international presidential trips made by Mário Soares
